title: Council Regulation (EC, Euratom) No 1149/1999 of 25 May 1999 amending Regulation (EC, Euratom) No 2728/94 establishing a Guarantee Fund for external actions
header:
COUNCIL REGULATION (EC, EURATOM) No 1149/1999
of 25 May 1999
amending Regulation (EC, Euratom) No 2728/94 establishing a Guarantee Fund for external actions
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body:
This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 January 2000.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 25 May 1999.
For the Council
The President
H. EICHEL
(1) OJ C 32, 6.2.1999, p. 11.
(2) OJ C 379, 7.12.1998, p. 155.
(3) Opinion delivered on 30 October 1998.
(4) OJ L 293, 12.11.1994, p. 1.
